data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Presidente Hayes against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Presidente Hayes, Paraguay
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Presidente Hayes, Paraguay today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Presidente Hayes to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 7,131 believers in the state of Presidente Hayes to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Presidente Hayes, Paraguay so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Presidente Hayes, Paraguay to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Presidente Hayes, Paraguay.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
